live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30711.summary: Some customers in the Sullivan Heights area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30711.title: Dec 19 – Burnaby (Sullivan Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
